short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow all iframes by dropping X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy HTTP headers. Handy test button. Works with MV3 in 2024+!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allow all iframes by dropping X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy HTTP headers.

Includes a handy test button which injects an iframe on the active page.

Works with Manifest V3 in 2024+!
